desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.animation

Class CmdGeneration

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.command.WriteCmds
      • desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.animation.CmdGeneration

  • public class CmdGeneration
extends WriteCmds
    CmdGeneration manages cmd- and log-file generation writing simTimeBound command and converts Simtime to animationTime

    • Method Detail

      • setStartStopTime

        public void setStartStopTime(TimeInstant begin,
                             TimeInstant end,
                             java.util.TimeZone timezone)
        Defines simulation start- and stop-time. Must be between experiment constructor and model-experiment connect.
        Attention: It makes no sence to define a TimeInstant before experiment constructor.
        Parameters:
        begin - Begin of simulation
        end - End of simulation
        timezone - Timezone of simulation, UTC when null

      • getCmdFileName

        public java.lang.String getCmdFileName()

      • getLogFileName

        public java.lang.String getLogFileName()

      • setCheckAndLog

        public void setCheckAndLog()
        Only when checkAndLog is set the Method CheckAndLog is active. Default is false. The Method checkAndLog makes a syntax and semantic check of the generated animation commands. The commands are also logged in logFileName from constructor. For semantic check the whole animation environment is build in heap. This consumes a lot of time and heap space. Normally the CheckAndLog Method is switched off.

      • setFlushSeq

        public void setFlushSeq(int flushSeq)
        sets the number of comands, when CommandFrame.writeCmdBuffer is flushed in cmdFile. Default is 1000 A small value reduces the uses buffer space and may be increases the running time.
        Overrides:
        setFlushSeq in class WriteCmds
        Parameters:
        flushSeq -

      • getIconPathURL

        public java.net.URL getIconPathURL()

      • write

        public void write(Command c)
        write a command in CommandFrame.writeCmdBuffer. When the buffer has more than this.flushSeq comands, the buffer is flushed in cmdFile
        Overrides:
        write in class WriteCmds
        Parameters:
        c - Command to write

      • checkAndLog

        public void checkAndLog(Command c)
        The Method checkAndLog makes a syntax and semantic check of the generated animation commands. The commands are also logged in logFileName from constructor. For semantic check the whole animation environment is build in heap. This consumes a lot of time and heap space. This Method works only when its switched on with setCheckAndLog() Method. Normally the CheckAndLog Method is switched off.
        Overrides:
        checkAndLog in class WriteCmds
        Parameters:
        c - Command to write
